K10D0319_H0323:297a-1: a'arya aa da bh'u ha dharma pary'a ya n'a ma /
K10D0319_H0323:297b-0: 'phags pa rmad du byung ba zhes bya ba'i chos kyi rnam @297b grangs /
K10D0319_H0323:297b-2: byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo //
K10D0319_H0323:297b-3: 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na /
K10D0319_H0323:297b-4: bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab na 'od ma'i tshal
K10D0319_H0323:297b-5: bya ka lan da ka gnas pa na bzhugs so
K10D0319_H0323:297b-6: // de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo
K10D0319_H0323:297b-7: snga dro'i dus kyi tshe chos gos dang sham thabs
K10D0319_H0323:297b-8: // bgos te / lhung bzed thogs nas rgyal po'i khab tu bsod snyoms kyi phyir zhugs te /
K10D0319_H0323:297b-9: tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo rgyal po'i khab
K10D0319_H0323:297b-10: kyi grong khyer du mthar chags su bsod snyoms spyod
K10D0319_H0323:297b-11: pa'i tshe phyogs zhig na khang pa brtsegs pa sgo
K10D0319_H0323:297b-17: dar gyi lnga lnga mang po dbyangs pa zhig mthong nas /
K10D0319_H0323:297b-20: rigs kyi bu mo dad pa gang la la zhig
K10D0319_H0323:297b-21: gis khang pa brtsegs pa 'di lta bu byas te
K10D0319_H0323:297b-22: / phyogs bzhi'i dge slong gi dge 'dun la phul ba dang /
K10D0319_H0323:297b-23: gang de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag
K10D0319_H0323:297b-24: par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas yongs su mya ngan las
K10D0319_H0323:297b-25: 'das pa'i mchod rten 'ji ba las skyu ru ra'i
K10D0319_H0323:297b-26: 'bras bu tsam byas la; kha ba tsam gyi srog
K10D0319_H0323:297b-27: shing btsugs te / rgya shug gi lo ma tsam gyi gdugs gsol nas /
K10D0319_H0323:297b-28: nas kyi 'bru tsam gyi sku gzugs byas la /
K10D0319_H0323:298a-0: yungs 'bru tsam gyi ring bsrel bcug na de @298a *//
K10D0319_H0323:298a-1: gnyis las bsod nams shin tu che ba gang yin snyam mo //
K10D0319_H0323:298a-3: ston pa ni bdag gi mngon sum du gyur pa /
K10D0319_H0323:298a-4: bde bar gshegs pa ni bdag gi mngon sum du gyur gyis /
K10D0319_H0323:298a-5: bcom ldan 'das la bdag gis don 'di nyid gsol te /
K10D0319_H0323:298a-6: bcom ldan 'das kyi bdag la ji skad bstan pa bzhin du gzung bar bya'o snyam mo //
K10D0319_H0323:298a-7: de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo rgyal po'i khab tu bsod snyoms blangs te /
K10D0319_H0323:298a-8: zas kyi bya ba byas nas bsod snyoms kyi zas phyi ma spangs te /
K10D0319_H0323:298a-9: chos gos dang; lhung bzed bzhag nas rkang pa bkrus te /
K10D0319_H0323:298a-10: bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song nas phyin pa dang /
K10D0319_H0323:298a-11: bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bor phyag btsal te phyogs gcig tu 'dug go /
K10D0319_H0323:298a-12: phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas kyang bcom ldan 'das la
K10D0319_H0323:298a-13: tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos 'di skad ces
K10D0319_H0323:298a-15: bdag 'dir snga dri'i dus kyi tshe chos gos dang /
K10D0319_H0323:298a-17: lhung bzed thogs te rgyal po'i khab tu bsod snyoms kyi slad du zhugs te /
K10D0319_H0323:298a-18: rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer du mthar chags su
K10D0319_H0323:298a-19: bsod snyoms spyod pa'i tshe phyogs zhig na khang pa
K10D0319_H0323:298a-20: brtsegs pa chab sgo brgyad cu mchis la byug pas
K10D0319_H0323:298b-0: dar gyi lnga ldi mang po @298b dbyangs pa dag mthong nas 'di snyam du bsams te /
K10D0319_H0323:298b-2: rigs kyi bu mo dad pa gang la la zhig
K10D0319_H0323:298b-3: gis khang pa brtsegs pa 'di lta bu bgyis te
K10D0319_H0323:298b-4: / phyogs bzhi'i dge slong gi dge 'dun la phul ba dang /
K10D0319_H0323:298b-5: gang gis de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang
K10D0319_H0323:298b-6: dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mya ngan las 'das
K10D0319_H0323:298b-7: pa'i mchod rten 'ji ba las skyu ru ra'i 'bras
K10D0319_H0323:298b-8: bu tsam bgyis la khab tsam gyi srog shing btsugs
K10D0319_H0323:298b-9: te / rgya shug gi lo ma tsam gyi gdugs gsol nas /
K10D0319_H0323:298b-10: nas kyi 'bru tsam gyi sku gzugs bgyis la yungs
K10D0319_H0323:298b-11: 'bru tsam gyi ring bsrel stsal na de gnyis bsod
K10D0319_H0323:298b-12: nams shin tu che ba gang lags snyam mo //
K10D0319_H0323:298b-13: bdag gis yang 'di snyam du bsams te /
K10D0319_H0323:298b-14: ston pa ni bdag gi mngon sum du gyur /
K10D0319_H0323:298b-15: bde bar gshegs pa ni bdag gi mngon sum du gyur gyi /
K10D0319_H0323:298b-16: bcom ldan 'das la bdag gis don 'di nyid gsol te /
K10D0319_H0323:298b-17: bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag la ji skad bstan pa
K10D0319_H0323:298b-18: bzhin du gzung ba rab kyi snyam nas; bcom ldan
K10D0319_H0323:298b-19: 'das la bdag don 'di nyid zhu lags na thugs
K10D0319_H0323:298b-20: brtse ba nye bar bzung ste /
K10D0319_H0323:298b-21: bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag la don 'di nyid legs par bstan du gsol //
K10D0319_H0323:298b-22: de skad ces gsol pa dang /
K10D0319_H0323:298b-23: bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to //
K10D0319_H0323:298b-25: khyod skye bo mang po la phan pa dang /
K10D0319_H0323:299a-2: 'jig rten la snying brtse ba'i phyir zhugs nas lha dang /
K10D0319_H0323:299a-3: mi rnams la phan pa dang /
K10D0319_H0323:299a-4: bde ba'i don gyi phyir khyod de bzhin gshegs pa
K10D0319_H0323:299a-5: la don 'di nyid 'dri bar sems pa ni legs
K10D0319_H0323:299a-8: de'i phyir legs par rab tu nyon la yid la zungs shig dang bshad do //
K10D0319_H0323:299a-10: dzambu gling gi gling ni char dpag tshad bdun stong /
K10D0319_H0323:299a-11: rgyar yang dpag tshad bdun stong /
K10D0319_H0323:299a-12: byang du ni kha tshon che ba /
K10D0319_H0323:299a-13: lhor ni sog kar 'dug pa de rigs kyi bu'am /
K10D0319_H0323:299a-14: rigs kyi bu mo dad pa gang la la zhig
K10D0319_H0323:299a-15: gis rin po che sna bdun gyi rang bzhin du
K10D0319_H0323:299a-16: byas te / rgyun du zhugs pa rnams dang /
K10D0319_H0323:299a-17: lan gcig phyir 'ong ba rnams dang /
K10D0319_H0323:299a-18: phyir mi 'ong ba rnams dang; dgra bcom pa rnams dang /
K10D0319_H0323:299a-20: phyogs bzhi'i dge slong gi dge 'dun la phul ba
K10D0319_H0323:299a-21: bas gang gis de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa
K10D0319_H0323:299a-22: yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas yongs su mya
K10D0319_H0323:299a-23: ngan las 'das pa'i mchod rten 'ji ba las skyu
K10D0319_H0323:299a-24: ru ra'i 'bras bu tsam byas la kha ba tsam
K10D0319_H0323:299a-26: rgya shug gi lo ma tsam gyi gdugs gsol nas /
K10D0319_H0323:299a-27: nas kyi 'bru tsam gyi sku gzugs byas la /
K10D0319_H0323:299a-28: yungs 'bru tsam gyi ring bsrel bcug na de ni
K10D0319_H0323:299b-0: de bas ches bsod nams che'o zhes nga @299b smra'o;
K10D0319_H0323:299b-1: ;kun dga' bo / dzambu'i gling lta zhog gi /
K10D0319_H0323:299b-3: shar gyi lus 'phags zhes bya ba'i gling yod de /
K10D0319_H0323:299b-4: chur ni dpag tshad brgyad stong /
K10D0319_H0323:299b-5: rgyar gang dpag tshad brgyad stong ste /
K10D0319_H0323:299b-6: kun nas zla gam lta bar grub pa de /

K10D0319_H0323:299b-30: chur ni dpag tshad dgu stong /
K10D0319_H0323:299b-31: zheng yang dpag tshad dgu stong ste /
K10D0319_H0323:299b-32: kun nas zla ba nya ba lta bu grub pa
K10D0319_H0323:299b-33: de rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo dad pa

K10D0319_H0323:301a-9: nub kyi ba lang spyod kyi gling lta'ang zhog /
K10D0319_H0323:301a-10: byang gi sgra mi snyan gyi gling lta'ang zhog /
K10D0319_H0323:301a-11: lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyi khang bzang rnam par rgyal byed ces bya ba lta'ang zhog ste /
K10D0319_H0323:301a-13: stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams yod de /
K10D0319_H0323:301a-14: de rigs kyi bu'am; rigs bu mo dad pa gang
K10D0319_H0323:301a-15: la la zhig gis rin po che sna bdun gyi
K10D0319_H0323:301a-17: rgyun du zhugs pa rnams dang /
K10D0319_H0323:301a-18: lan gcig phyir 'ong ba rnams dang /
K10D0319_H0323:301a-20: dgra bcom pa rnams dang; rang sangs rgyas rnams dang /
K10D0319_H0323:301a-21: phyogs bzhi'i dge slong gi dge 'dun la phul ba bas /
K10D0319_H0323:301a-22: gang gis de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang
K10D0319_H0323:301a-23: dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas yongs su mya ngan
K10D0319_H0323:301a-24: las 'dras pa'i mchod rten 'ji ba las skyu ru
K10D0319_H0323:301a-25: ra'i 'bras bu tsam byas la khab tsam gyi srog
K10D0319_H0323:301a-26: shing btsugs te / rgya shug gi lo ma tsam
K10D0319_H0323:301b-0: gyi @301b gdugs byas nas nas kyi 'bru tsam gyi
K10D0319_H0323:301b-1: sku gzugs byas la yungs 'bru tsam gyi ring bsrel
K10D0319_H0323:301b-2: bcug na de ni de bas ches bsod nams che'o
K10D0319_H0323:301b-3: shing btsugs te / zhes nga smra'o // de ci'i phyir zhe na /
K10D0319_H0323:301b-5: de bzhin gshegs pa ni ye shes kyis dpag tu med pa /
K10D0319_H0323:301b-6: tshul khrims kyis dpag tu med pa /
K10D0319_H0323:301b-7: bzod pas dpag tu med pa /
K10D0319_H0323:301b-8: brtson 'grus kyis dpag tu med pa /
K10D0319_H0323:301b-9: bsam gtan gyis dpag tu med pa /
K10D0319_H0323:301b-10: shes rab kyis dpag tu med pa /
K10D0319_H0323:301b-11: byams pas dpag tu med pa /
K10D0319_H0323:301b-12: snying rjes dpag tu med pa /
K10D0319_H0323:301b-13: dga' bas dpag tu med pa /
K10D0319_H0323:301b-14: btang snyoms kyis dpag tu med pa /
K10D0319_H0323:301b-15: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dang /
K10D0319_H0323:301b-18: sangs rgyas kyi chos dran pa nye bar gzhag pa ma 'dres pa gsum dang /
K10D0319_H0323:301b-19: snying rje chen pos dpag tu med pa ste /
K10D0319_H0323:301b-21: de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par
K10D0319_H0323:301b-22: rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ni yon tan dpag tu med
K10D0319_H0323:301b-23: pa dang ldan pa'i phyir ro //
K10D0319_H0323:301b-24: de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /
K10D0319_H0323:301b-25: tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to //
K10D0319_H0323:301b-28: chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ni ngo mtshar lags so //
K10D0319_H0323:301b-31: chos kyi rnam grangs 'di'i ming ci lags /
K10D0319_H0323:302a-3: de'i phyir chos kyi rnam grangs 'di rmad du byung
K10D0319_H0323:302a-4: ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs zhes bya bar zungs shig
K10D0319_H0323:302a-5: / de bas na chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ni
K10D0319_H0323:302a-6: rmad du byung ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs zhes bya
K10D0319_H0323:302a-8: bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas
K10D0319_H0323:302a-9: tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo yi rangs te
K10D0319_H0323:302a-10: / bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do //
K10D0319_H0323:302a-11: 'phags pa rmad du byung ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs rdzogs so ////
K10D0319_H0323:302a-12: rgya gar gyi mkhan po ji na mi tra dang /
